D

databackups - package databackups
 
DatabaseBackUp - Class in databackups
The DatabaseBackUp class provides functionality to back up CSV files from a source directory into a timestamped ZIP file in a backup directory.
DatabaseBackUp() - Constructor for class databackups.DatabaseBackUp
Constructs a DatabaseBackUp instance.
DataExporterAppend<T> - Interface in filereaders
The DataExporterAppend interface defines the contract for appending data to a file.
DataExporterWriter<T> - Interface in filereaders
The DataExporterWriter interface defines the contract for writing data to a file.
DataImporter - Interface in filereaders
The DataImporter interface defines the contract for importing and reloading data from files.
DateFormatterInterface - Interface in filereaders
The DateFormatterInterface defines the contract for creating a DateTimeFormatter.
DateFormatterService - Interface in filereaders
The DateFormatterService interface defines the contract for formatting date strings.
deletePatient(Scanner) - Method in class usermanagement.PatientManagementControl
 
deleteStaff(Scanner) - Method in class usermanagement.StaffManagementControl
Deletes a staff member from the system.
displayAgeDistribution() - Method in class reportmanagement.PatientReportControl
Displays the age distribution of patients in a bar chart format.
displayAverageAgeByDiagnosis() - Method in class reportmanagement.PatientReportControl
Displays the average age of patients by diagnosis.
displayData() - Method in class appointmentslots.AppointmentSlot
Provides a detailed string representation of the appointment slot, suitable for display to users.
displayDiagnosisDistribution() - Method in class reportmanagement.PatientReportControl
Displays the diagnosis distribution of patients in a sorted bar chart format.
displayGenderDistribution() - Method in class reportmanagement.PatientReportControl
Displays the gender distribution of patients in a bar chart format.
displayInventory() - Method in class medicinemanagements.InventoryManagementControl
Displays the current medication inventory in a formatted table, showing the medicine name, stock quantity, and low stock alert.
displayMenu() - Method in class ui.AdministratorUI
Displays the main administrator menu and provides options for various administrative tasks.
displayMenu() - Method in class ui.DoctorUI
Displays the main menu for the doctor and provides options for various tasks, including: Viewing and updating patient medical records Viewing personal schedules Setting availability for appointments Managing appointment requests Recording appointment outcomes Applying for leave Changing password Logging out This method runs in a loop until the doctor selects the logout option.
displayMenu() - Method in class ui.PatientUI
Displays the main menu for the patient and provides options for various tasks, including: Viewing and updating personal medical records Viewing available appointment slots Scheduling, rescheduling, or canceling appointments Viewing scheduled appointments and past appointment outcomes Changing password Logging out This method runs in a loop until the patient selects the logout option.
displayMenu() - Method in class ui.PharmacistUI
Displays the main menu for the pharmacist and provides options for various tasks, including: Viewing appointment outcome records Updating prescription statuses Viewing medication inventory Submitting replenishment requests Changing password Logging out This method runs in a loop until the pharmacist selects the logout option.
displayMenu() - Method in class users.Administrator
Displays the administrator's menu by delegating the task to the AdministratorUI.
displayMenu() - Method in class users.Doctor
Displays the doctor's menu by delegating the task to the DoctorUI.
displayMenu() - Method in class users.Patient
Displays the patient's menu by delegating the task to the PatientUI.
displayMenu() - Method in class users.Pharmacist
Displays the pharmacist's menu by delegating the task to the PharmacistUI.
displayMenu() - Method in class users.Users
Abstract method to display the user's menu.
displayPatients() - Method in class usermanagement.PatientManagementControl
Displays all patients in a structured tabular format.
displayReportMenu() - Method in class ui.AdministratorReportUI
Displays the main menu for patient report analysis.
displayStaff() - Method in class usermanagement.StaffManagementControl
Displays the details of all staff members (doctors, pharmacists, and administrators).
displayTreatmentDistribution() - Method in class reportmanagement.PatientReportControl
Displays the treatment distribution of patients in a sorted bar chart format.
Doctor - Class in users
The Doctor class represents a doctor in the system.
Doctor(String, String, String, int, String) - Constructor for class users.Doctor
Constructs a new Doctor instance with the specified details.
DoctorUI - Class in ui
The DoctorUI class provides a menu-driven interface for doctors within the hospital management system.
DoctorUI(Doctor) - Constructor for class ui.DoctorUI
Constructs a DoctorUI instance for the specified doctor.
